Author: K-Cli
Name: Bozja Buddy
Description:
Features:
• Info about Lost Actions, Fragments, FATEs/CE e.g. location, drops, fate chains, mettle rewards, exp rewards, etc.
• Weather forecast.
• Alarms: Time-based, Weather-based, FATE/CE-based.
• Filterable loadouts planning, saving, and sharing. Featuring a few recommended DRS loadouts from ABBA.
